title: The Gifted Vol.1: The Haunting Woman
description: In the amusement area of City, if a guy turns down an eerie woman's invite, her spirit haunts him until his death. This urban legend now seems to be related to real murder cases.To probe the identity of the woman's ghost recorded on video cameras, four gifted people begin their investigation: Milo, a charismatic, beautiful boy with platinum blonde hair; Saya, an innocent Asian girl shouldering a sad past; Chloe, a big sister-like attractive woman who likes to oblige others; and Riccardo, a cheerful, handsome womanizer.As the quartet seeks the truth about the case, the mysterious ghost starts haunting Riccardo and puts him in danger of death â€¦This work was exclusively written for The BBB: Breakthrough Bandwagon Books.
author: Ryosuke Akizuki
